Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Requires wardens or superintendents of correctional facilities to accept assistance from state and federal agencies and municipalities
Summary: Requires wardens or superintendents of correctional facilities to accept assistance from state and federal agencies and municipalities in the event of an emergency, including loss of power, heat, or water or a medical state of emergency.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to requiring wardens or superintendents of correctional facilities to accept assistance from state and federal agencies and municipalities
